payment_hash.description: the hash of the *payment_preimage* which will prove payment

payment_secret.description: the *payment_secret* to place in the onion

expires_at.description: UNIX timestamp of when invoice expires

warning_capacity.description: even using all possible channels, there's not enough incoming capacity to pay this invoice.

warning_offline.description: there would be enough incoming capacity, but some channels are offline, so there isn't.

warning_deadends.description: there would be enough incoming capacity, but some channels are dead-ends (no other public channels from those peers), so there isn't.

warning_private_unused.description: there would be enough incoming capacity, but some channels are unannounced and *exposeprivatechannels* is *false*, so there isn't.

warning_mpp.description: there is sufficient capacity, but not in a single channel, so the payer will have to use multi-part payments.
